commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We've been getting a lot of members since we asked you to join up, Ayumu. I knew you would be a great first pick!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What? I haven't done anything, but...I'm really glad to hear that.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We can't rest on our laurels just yet, though! It's time to go try and get back Kanata!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I know where she is, so follow me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: W-Well I have an idea of where she'd be, too!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Giggle* We might have the same idea. The infirmary or the garden, right? I checked a while ago, and it looks like she's in the infirmary today.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Urgh... Wh-Who's there?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It's Shizuku, Kanata.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Shizuku? Oh, hi, it's been a while. You been doing well?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Mmhm, really well. B-But small talk aside, we're here to bring you back to the school idol club!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Kanata, the club's going to be disbanded! Please, you've got to come back!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Disbanded?! That's...real sad. We gotta stop that. Still, it'd be a little hard for me to go back now. I do want to, though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um, hello, Kanata! Good to meet you. I've heard you were a club member before, so I had Shizuku and Kasumi bring me here.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, this is another second year, Ayumu Uehara.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: She's a new member of the club, too. We also have Rina Tennoji, a first year, and Ai Miyashita, a second year.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Like Kasumi said, the club is in big trouble right now. It's going to be disbanded if we don't get ten members, so...we want you back, Kanata!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Things took a pretty bad turn when I was gone.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: But I've really got a bunch on my plate right now. I like being a school idol, but I can't right now. I'm in a bind and real busy.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: A bind? Did something happen? If there's anything we can do to help, let us know!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: My grades dropped, and really badly.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I super tanked my mid-terms. If I don't get serious for finals, it'll be really bad, so I'm studying hard, but...math is getting me. I just don't get it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, in that case...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rina and Ai picked a lot of science and math classes, so how about getting them to help you?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Wait, really? It'd be that easy?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If they help you with your studies, you can be a school idol at the same time!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hey, that's a really nice idea. I'll come back, then. So, not to rush things, but are they in the clubroom?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I think they are.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Then let's get going! It's been a while since my eyes've been this open!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: ...Wait, there's no one here! Kasumi, you lied to me!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ahh! W-Well, I wanted to kidnaâ€”er, captu... N-No, I mean, I wanted to bring you to the clubroom before you changed your mind!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Hiya, sounds pretty busy in... Huh? Hey, did we get some new members?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Emma?!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Emma, did you come back after seeing us moving around?!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Huh? Come back? Oh, yeah, I just got back from Switzerland. Here's your souvenirs. Oh, there's plenty to go around, so share them with our new friends, okay?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Uh... Huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kasumi, this is Emma, right?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Greetings, my name is Emma Verde. Glad to have you onboard.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, wait... Emma, you came back on your own?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Huh? Why wouldn't I? This is the school idol club room, right...?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: U-Um, Emma! You haven't come to the room in a while, right?! You were distancing yourself from the club, r-right?!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Huh? No, I had to go back to Switzerland for a while. I left a letter, you know.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: W-Wait, that...that was a letter you wrote?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? What's up, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: ...So this was actually from Emma? I... I thought it was some weird threat from a rival.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ahh, I'm so sorry! I jumped to conclusions!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Well, Emma's back, so it all worked out, right?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Now we have seven people! Let's keep going until we get ten!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, let's go talk to Setsuna Yuki next! We don't know where she is, but if we all split up...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? Did something just bump into the door?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It might be a hopeful!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I've seen that back somewhere before.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Could it be...)
